questions.question: What is the primary color of the packaging's background, providing the backdrop for the product's name and branding elements?

Focusing solely on the textual description, what flavor profile, described in a single word, does this almond milk possess?
What adjective, accurately reflecting the product's formulation, describes the absence of added sugars?
What certification label is present on the packaging, indicating adherence to organic agricultural practices?
Observing the graphic elements, what nut is featured prominently on the label, symbolizing the product's primary ingredient?
What is the primary color of the illustrated almonds depicted on the carton, as seen next to the product name?
Referring to the brand identification on the packaging, what three-digit numerical value identifies the brand associated with this product?
What is the primary color of the brand logo, located at the top of the carton, representing the associated supermarket?
What is the texture of the depicted almond milk splash, conveying a sense of fluidity and creaminess?
What is the format or packaging material utilized for this product, which is also visually evident?
What is the overall style of the label's design, combining textual and illustrative elements?
What is the dominant color used to depict the almond leaves in the design?
What word describes the overall presentation and layout of the information on the packaging?
